item.title: Hyperliquid has launched XPL Perpetual Swap Contract Trading.
item.description: On August 22nd, as per the official website, Hyperliquid has initiated XPL perpetual futures contracts, capable of supporting up to 3 times leverage. The current pre-market trading price of XPL is $0.37506.

item.title: Arthur Hayes sold ETH twice and was forced to buy back at a higher price
item.description: On August 22nd, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, since Arthur Hayes's "ETH = 5,000" post on December 22nd, 2023, his public wallet address has been involved in ETH swing trading. Intriguingly, Arthur Hayes has sold ETH twice. On both occasions, the price of ETH has continuously risen, compelling him to repurchase at a higher price.

item.title: Binance Plasma USDT Fixed Savings Round 2 with a $250 million allocation was sold out within 5 minutes
item.description: August 22nd. According to the official announcement, the coin-minting product of Binance Launchpool, the Plasma USDT fixed-term product (with limited time and quantity), had its second round of 250 million USDT quota sold out within 5 minutes.Earlier today, Binance announced an increase in the total subscription limit for the Plasma fixed-term product to 1 billion USDT. The second batch of quota (250 million USDT) was officially opened for subscription starting at 17:00 on August 22, 2025 (UTC+8).

item.title: Binance Alpha's latest XPIN airdrop yielded approximately $39 per eligible user.
item.description: On August 22nd, based on market data, XPIN Network (XPIN) has been listed on Binance Alpha, and its current market capitalization is $2.85 million. Each eligible user can receive an airdrop of 80,000 XPIN tokens. The estimated single airdrop reward at the current price is approximately $39.

item.title: Tonight, prior to Powell's speech, the probability of a 25 basis point rate cut by the Fed in September decreased to 71.3%.
item.description: On August 22nd, based on CME's "FedWatch" data, prior to Powell's speech at the Jackson Hole Symposium tonight, the likelihood of a 25-basis-point rate cut by the Fed in September has decreased to 71.3%, while the probability of rates remaining unchanged is 28.7%.The probability of the Fed keeping rates unchanged until October is 14.6%, the probability of a cumulative 25-basis-point rate cut is 50.4%, and the probability of a cumulative 50-basis-point rate cut is 35.1%.The dates of the next two FOMC meetings by the Fed are September 17th and October 29th.

item.title: APT Launches Backpack Trading Platform
item.description: On August 22nd, the native token APT of Aptos was officially launched on the Backpack exchange platform.Backpack is a compliant cryptocurrency exchange that holds a license from the Dubai Virtual Asset Regulatory Authority (VARA). Now that APT is available, users can engage in APT spot trading on Backpack and take advantage of convenient fiat onramp using USDC through cross-chain functionality.Moreover, APT holders can utilize APT as collateral on Backpack to participate in perpetual contracts and earn rewards, thereby further enhancing the flexibility and efficiency of capital utilization.Given the high-performance and low-latency advantages of the Aptos Network, users can experience a fast, secure, and professional trading environment on Backpack. The listing of APT on Backpack not only enriches the financial infrastructure of the Aptos ecosystem but also showcases its great potential in professional trading and DeFi applications.

item.title: Pre-market Crypto Stocks Surge in US Stock Market, Bitmine Up by 4.44%, SharpLink Up by 4.38%
item.description: On August 22nd, based on market data, the pre-market trading of cryptocurrency stocks in the US witnessed a general upward trend. Among them, Bitmine, the Ethereum Treasury company, and SharpLink took the lead in gains. The specific gains included:Bitmine (BMNR) increased by 4.44%;SharpLink Gaming (SBET) rose by 4.38%;Coinbase (COIN) went up by 0.52%;Circle (CRCL) advanced by 1.46%;MicroStrategy (MSTR) increased by 0.67%;Bullish (BLSH) gained by 1.3%;BTCS (BTCS) rose by 0.7%;ETHZilla (ETHZ) decreased by 9.56%.

item.title: Binance will launch XPL (Plasma) Perpetual Futures Pre-market Trading
item.description: On August 22nd, Binance will commence U-based XPL (Plasma) perpetual contract trading at 17:30 (UTC+8). The maximum leverage offered is 5x.

item.title: Bitunix is officially integrating TradingView, supporting real-time price and chart data.
item.description: August 22nd. Bitunix has now been officially integrated with TradingView. Users are now able to check all Bitunix trading pairs, such as BTCUSDT, on this platform. They can instantly view price trends, trading volume, and multi-timeframe chart data. This also indicates that Bitunix has become one of the official data sources for TradingView.This integration fully supports TradingView's charting tools, including technical indicators, drawing tools, and custom chart layouts. It allows users to analyze the Bitunix market trends in a familiar interface. Whether you are a beginner or a professional trader, you can now easily search for and track the market dynamics of Bitunix on TradingView.

item.title: US Stock Futures Soar in a "V" Shape, All Three Major Futures Turn Green
item.description: On August 22nd, based on market data, the US stock market witnessed a rise in pre-market trading. Futures took on a "V" shape, and all three major futures turned positive. Dow Jones Industrial Average Futures increased by 0.20%, S&P 500 Futures rose by 0.13%, and Nasdaq 100 Futures went up by 0.07%.
